snippet: The high musical standards of the concert series Sacred Music in a Sacred Space was on display in a performance of Bach’s B-minor Mass.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews concert of Bach music performed by Choir and Orchestra of St Ignatius Loyola at Church of St Ignatius Loyola as part of Sacred Music in a Sacred Space series.
lead_paragraph: The high musical standards of the concert series Sacred Music in a Sacred Space was on display in a performance of Bach’s B-minor Mass.

headline.main: Review: At St. Ignatius Loyola, Bach’s Mass in All Its Elements
headline.print_headline: A Latin Mass in All Its Elements

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Choir and Orchestra of St Ignatius Loyola
